name: core-agent
author: gameswu
desc: 内置核心 Agent 处理器 — 编排 personality、memory、protocol-adapter、plugin-tool-bridge 插件，处理用户输入、触碰事件等消息，支持完整的工具循环

en-US.desc: Built-in core Agent handler — orchestrates personality, memory, protocol-adapter and plugin-tool-bridge plugins; handles user input, tap events and supports full tool loop
